description:
Monroe and Sakura retire, leaving a new earth sciences club run by Mira, Ao, and Ino. In order to build Ino`s confidence as their president, they agree to hold a lecture for a children`s star-viewing.
Mira and others struggle to get the uncooperative children interested in the activity. Later, Ao is absent from school the morning after she watches the Orionid meteor shower. Mira and Ino visit her out of concern, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Starry Sky Is a Time Machine
السماء المرصّعة بالنجوم هي آلة زمن
